title: The Original Keencyclopedia (where?)
content: Does anyone know where this is? I mean, there's nothing wrong with the new searchable php one, but just ... nostalgia, you know? I remember it was all on one big page, and there were two version of it - one with images, one text-only. Is it mirrored anywhere? (Where was it to begin with?) I know Xtraverse rescued lots of old Keen sites and stuck them on spatang, but I didn't see this there.

title: Re: The Original Keencyclopedia (where?)
content:
Gargs, I can't find it either. I think the one archived on xtra's site was at [url=http://www.spatang.com/keencyclopedia/]www.spatang.com/keencyclopedia/[/url] at some point of time, but not anymore.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: The Original Keencyclopedia (where?)
content:
Yeah, it was there. Here's a Wayback Machine result:

[url=http://web.archive.org/web/20050505235151/www.spatang.com/keencyclopedia/textkeencyclopedia.html]web.archive.org/web/20050...pedia.html[/url]

The non-text version wasn't cached by the Wayback machine, unfortunately.____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
Oh, and [url=http://www.tengusoft.net/]Team[/url].

title: the graphic version
content:
Thanks, DaVince! I went on a little bit of a hunch, combined with a vague memory, and sure enough:

[url=http://web.archive.org/web/20050505235113/www.spatang.com/keencyclopedia/keencyclopedia.html]web.archive.org/web/20050...pedia.html[/url]

That's the original Keencyclopedia! Including images! Well, actually *not* including images, but they're probably all at the modern Keencyclopedia, so at some point I might reconstruct it for fun.

title: Re: the graphic version
content: Huh...I have no idea why it's not there anymore.  I'll look around.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: The Original Keencyclopedia (where?)
content:
wasn't it on the all u can eat commander keen page?--------
Keen wears his watch on his RIGHT wrist... Is he left handed? Nope, he shoots with his right hand too.

"Dear Mother, I can't believe what happened today! I met one of the smartest people in the whole Universe! His IQ is three f...
Hold on, Mother. Something strange is happening...
6234yuweyudfhjgfklgmm,/.,"
